operations.notes: The license agreement has to be accepted before performing any other API calls.
The license agreement has to be accepted before performing any other API calls.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Base64 encoded value of a license.

connectionCount.description: Maximum number of connections permitted under the group.

name.description: Group name from the license file.

accepted.description: Indicates whether license agreement has been accepted. The default value is false.

name.description: Name of the person the license was issued to.

maxConnections.description: Maximum number of connections that can be created under this license (if applicable).

tier.description: The tier value from the license file. The possible values are FREE, PERPETUAL or SUBSCRIPTION.

issueDate.description: The issue date value from the license file.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date value from the license file (if applicable).

enforcementType.description:
The enforcement type is a 3-bit binary value, expressed as a decimal digit. The bits from left to right are:
1: Shutdown on expire
2: Notify on expire
4: Enforce minor version
if all three enforcements are active, the enforcement type will be 7 (1 + 2 + 4); if only the first two are active, you have an enforcement type of 3 (1 + 2).

version.description: The Ping Identity product version from the license file.

product.description: The Ping Identity product value from the license file.

organization.description: The organization value from the license file.

gracePeriod.description: Number of days provided as grace period, past the expiration date (if applicable).

nodeLimit.description: Maximum number of clustered nodes allowed under this license (if applicable).

oauthEnabled.description: Indicates whether OAuth role is enabled for this license.

wsTrustEnabled.description: Indicates whether WS-Trust role is enabled for this license.

provisioningEnabled.description: Indicates whether Provisioning role is enabled for this license.
